enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable the FX Translator addon

buttonText.name: Button Text
buttonText.description: Text displayed on the translate button (e.g., [T], Translate)

showButtonOnOwnMessages.name: Show Button on Own Messages
showButtonOnOwnMessages.description: Display the translate button on your own messages

translatorEngine.name: Translation Engine
translatorEngine.description: Choose which translation service to use

sourceLanguage.name: Source Language
sourceLanguage.description: Language to translate from (Auto Detect recommended)

enableCache.name: Enable Translation Cache
enableCache.description: Cache translations to improve performance and reduce API calls

deeplApiKey.name: DeepL API Key
deeplApiKey.description: Your DeepL API authentication key (required for DeepL translation). Get yours at https://www.deepl.com/pro-api

deeplUseFreeApi.name: Use DeepL Free API
deeplUseFreeApi.description: Enable if you're using a DeepL Free API key, disable for DeepL Pro API

azureApiKey.name: Azure API Key
azureApiKey.description: Your Azure Translator subscription key (required for Azure translation). Get yours from Azure Portal

azureRegion.name: Azure Region
azureRegion.description: Azure region for your Translator resource (e.g., eastus, westeurope). Find this in your Azure Portal

showLoadingMessage.name: Show Loading Message
showLoadingMessage.description: Display 'Translating...' message while translation is in progress

preserveMessageColors.name: Preserve Message Colors
preserveMessageColors.description: Keep the original message colors and formatting in the translated text

resetToDefaults.name: Reset to Defaults
resetToDefaults.description: Made a mistake with your settings? No worries! Click this button to reset everything back to default values, just like when you first installed the addon
